With the work of bug 56200 you can open an external scrapbook page.
To setup the Snippet editor for dealing with the external files changes to:
EvaluateAction, JavaSnippetEditor, SelectImportsDialog, 
ShowInPackageViewAction, SnippetAction and SnippetEditorActionContributor
